    • About The Star Team

    The Star Team at Bluewater Real Estate is comprised of a team of local real estate professionals committed to selling some of the most desired homes in Crystal Coast. Selling these “right addresses” is the mission of Star Team Real Estate. Let us know what you’re looking for.
